languages.text: "{name}, вне зависимости от того, насколько часто вы преклоняете колени перед алтарем, советую отнестись к этому серьезно. Если творится то, о чем я думаю — а я молюсь Трону, что это не так — можете считать, что Император и впрямь хранит вас и этот корабль".

"{name}, regardless of how regularly you kneel before an altar, I advise you to take this warning seriously. If I am correct in my suspicions about what is transpiring here — and I pray to the Throne that I am not — then you can indeed consider this incident a sign that the Emperor is watching over you and this ship."
languages.original_text: "{name}, вне зависимости от того, насколько часто вы преклоняете колени перед алтарем, советую отнестись к этому серьезно. Если творится то, о чем я думаю — а я молюсь Трону, что это не так — можете считать, что Император и впрямь хранит вас и этот корабль".

If I am correct in my suspicions about what is transpiring here — and I pray to the Throne that I am not — then you can indeed consider this incident a sign that the Emperor is watching over you and this ship."

languages.text: «{name}, independientemente de la regularidad con la que se arrodille ante un altar, le recomiendo que se tome en serio esta advertencia. Si mis sospechas sobre la situación son correctas, y ojalá me equivoque, puede considerar este incidente una señal de que el Emperador l{mf|e|a}s protege a usted y a su nave».
languages.original_text: "{name}, regardless of how regularly you kneel before an altar, I advise you to take this warning seriously. If I am correct in my suspicions about what is transpiring here — and I pray to the Throne that I am not — then you can indeed consider this incident a sign that the Emperor is watching over you and this ship."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, independientemente de la regularidad con la que se arrodille ante un altar, le recomiendo que se tome en serio esta advertencia. Si mis sospechas sobre la situación son correctas, y ojalá me equivoque, puede considerar este incidente una señal de que el Emperador l{mf|e|a}s protege a usted y a su nave».

languages.text: 「{name}、君が祭壇の前に跪く頻度は知らないが、この警告を真摯に受け止めることをお勧めする。もしここで起きていることについて俺の疑念が正しければ…そうでないことを王座に祈るがね…この件は皇帝が君とこの船を見守っておられるサインだと考えるといい」
languages.original_text: "{name}, regardless of how regularly you kneel before an altar, I advise you to take this warning seriously. If I am correct in my suspicions about what is transpiring here — and I pray to the Throne that I am not — then you can indeed consider this incident a sign that the Emperor is watching over you and this ship."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、君が祭壇の前に跪く頻度は知らないが、この警告を真摯に受け止めることをお勧めする。もしここで起きていることについて俺の疑念が正しければ…そうでないことを王座に祈るがね…この件は皇帝が君とこの船を見守っておられるサインだと考えるといい」

languages.text: “{name}，无论你是否经常跪在祭坛前祷告，我都建议你认真对待这个警告。我向黄金王座祈祷，希望我的怀疑是错的，但如果我担心的事情真的要发生了，那你确实可以认为帝皇正在关注你和你的船，而这件事情便是祂对你发出的警告。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, regardless of how regularly you kneel before an altar, I advise you to take this warning seriously. If I am correct in my suspicions about what is transpiring here — and I pray to the Throne that I am not — then you can indeed consider this incident a sign that the Emperor is watching over you and this ship."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，无论你是否经常跪在祭坛前祷告，我都建议你认真对待这个警告。我向黄金王座祈祷，希望我的怀疑是错的，但如果我担心的事情真的要发生了，那你确实可以认为帝皇正在关注你和你的船，而这件事情便是祂对你发出的警告。”

languages.text: "{name}, unabhängig davon, wie regelmäßig Ihr vor einem Altar kniet, rate ich Euch, diese Warnung ernstzunehmen. Ich bete zum Thron, dass mein Verdacht nicht stimmt, was hier vor sich geht. Wenn er aber stimmt, dann könnt Ihr diesen Vorfall tatsächlich als Zeichen werten, dass der Imperator über Euch und dieses Schiff wacht."
languages.original_text: "{name}, regardless of how regularly you kneel before an altar, I advise you to take this warning seriously. If I am correct in my suspicions about what is transpiring here — and I pray to the Throne that I am not — then you can indeed consider this incident a sign that the Emperor is watching over you and this ship."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, unabhängig davon, wie regelmäßig Ihr vor einem Altar kniet, rate ich Euch, diese Warnung ernstzunehmen. Ich bete zum Thron, dass mein Verdacht nicht stimmt, was hier vor sich geht. Wenn er aber stimmt, dann könnt Ihr diesen Vorfall tatsächlich als Zeichen werten, dass der Imperator über Euch und dieses Schiff wacht."

languages.text: « {name}, quelle que soit l'assiduité dont vous faites preuve dans vos prières, je vous invite à prendre cet avertissement au sérieux. Si mes soupçons sont fondés, et je prie le Trône pour me tromper, alors vous pouvez effectivement considérer cet incident comme un signe que l'Empereur veille sur vous et sur ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, regardless of how regularly you kneel before an altar, I advise you to take this warning seriously. If I am correct in my suspicions about what is transpiring here — and I pray to the Throne that I am not — then you can indeed consider this incident a sign that the Emperor is watching over you and this ship."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, quelle que soit l'assiduité dont vous faites preuve dans vos prières, je vous invite à prendre cet avertissement au sérieux. Si mes soupçons sont fondés, et je prie le Trône pour me tromper, alors vous pouvez effectivement considérer cet incident comme un signe que l'Empereur veille sur vous et sur ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Ne sıklıkta sunağın önünde diz çökersen çök {name}, sana bu uyarıyı ciddiye almanı tavsiye ediyorum. Burada yaşananlara dair kuşkularımda haklıysam ki haksız çıkmak için Taht'a dua ediyorum, bu olayı İmparator'un seni ve bu gemiyi koruyup kolladığına dair bir işaret olarak görebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "{name}, regardless of how regularly you kneel before an altar, I advise you to take this warning seriously. If I am correct in my suspicions about what is transpiring here — and I pray to the Throne that I am not — then you can indeed consider this incident a sign that the Emperor is watching over you and this ship."
